data.approach: Implement project rename feature: 1) Create API endpoint /api/projects/rename 2) Add Rename button to ProjectEditor.svelte with modal dialog 3) Handle filesystem rename, projects.json update, credential migration, and agent cleanup

data.taskTitle: user wants to rename a project
summary: Created POST /api/projects/rename endpoint that handles filesystem rename, projects.json update, credentials migration, and agent cleanup
Added Rename button and modal to ProjectEditor.svelte with validation and preview
Implemented auto-kill for running agents with UI feedback showing which agents were stopped
reviewFocus: Test filesystem rename rollback on config save failure

summary: Renames filesystem directory, projects.json key/path, and display name
